dialogs.save_folder:
SnapEnhance requires Storage permissions to download and Save Media from Snapchat.
Please choose the location where media should be downloaded to.

mappings.dialog: To dynamically support a wide range of Snapchat Versions, mappings are necessary for SnapEnhance to function properly, this should not take more than 5 seconds.
mappings.generate_failure_no_snapchat: SnapEnhance was unable to detect Snapchat, please try reinstalling Snapchat.
mappings.generate_failure: An error occurred while trying to generate mappings, please try again.

permissions.dialog: To continue you need to fit the following requirements:

auto_download.name: Auto download
auto_download.description: Automatically download Snaps when viewing them

stealth.name: Stealth Mode
stealth.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you've opened their Snaps/Chats and conversations

auto_save.name: Auto Save
auto_save.description: Saves Chat Messages when viewing them

notices.internal_behavior: ⚠ This may break Snapchat internal behavior

save_folder.name: Save Folder
save_folder.description: Select the directory to which all media should be downloaded to

auto_download_sources.name: Auto Download Sources
auto_download_sources.description: Select the sources to automatically download from

prevent_self_auto_download.name: Prevent Self Auto Download
prevent_self_auto_download.description: Prevents your own Snaps from being downloaded automatically

allow_duplicate.name: Allow Duplicate
allow_duplicate.description: Allows the same media to be downloaded multiple times

merge_overlays.name: Merge Overlays
merge_overlays.description: Combines the Text and the media of a Snap into a single file

force_image_format.name: Force Image Format
force_image_format.description: Forces images to be saved in a specified Format

force_voice_note_format.name: Force Voice Note Format
force_voice_note_format.description: Forces Voice Notes to be saved in a specified Format

download_profile_pictures.name: Download Profile Pictures
download_profile_pictures.description: Allows you to download Profile Pictures from the profile page

chat_download_context_menu.name: Chat Download Context Menu
chat_download_context_menu.description: Allows you to download media from a conversation by long-pressing them

threads.name: Threads
threads.description: The amount of threads to use

preset.name: Preset
preset.description: Set the speed of the conversion

constant_rate_factor.name: Constant Rate Factor
constant_rate_factor.description:
Set the constant rate factor for the video encoder
From 0 to 51 for libx264

custom_video_codec.name: Custom Video Codec
custom_video_codec.description: Set a custom Video Codec (e.g. libx264)

custom_audio_codec.name: Custom Audio Codec
custom_audio_codec.description: Set a custom Audio Codec (e.g. AAC)

logging.name: Logging
logging.description: Shows toasts when media is downloading

user_interface.name: User Interface
user_interface.description: Change the look and feel of Snapchat

enable_app_appearance.name: Enable App Appearance Settings
enable_app_appearance.description:
Enables the hidden App Appearance Setting
May not be required on newer Snapchat versions

amoled_dark_mode.name: AMOLED Dark Mode
amoled_dark_mode.description:
Enables AMOLED dark mode
Make sure Snapchats Dark mode is enabled

home_tab.name: Home Tab
home_tab.description: Overrides the startup tab when opening Snapchat

map_friend_nametags.name: Enhanced Friend Map Nametags
map_friend_nametags.description: Improves the Nametags of friends on the Snapmap

streak_expiration_info.name: Show Streak Expiration Info
streak_expiration_info.description: Shows a Streak Expiration timer next to the Streaks counter

hide_story_sections.name: Hide Story Section
hide_story_sections.description: Hide certain UI Elements shown in the story section

hide_ui_components.name: Hide UI Components
hide_ui_components.description: Select which UI components to hide

2d_bitmoji_selfie.name: 2D Bitmoji Selfie
2d_bitmoji_selfie.description:
Brings back the 2D Bitmoji selfies from older Snapchat versions
You may need to clean the Snapchat cache for this to take effect

startup_tab.name: Startup Tab
startup_tab.description: Change the tab that opens on startup

story_viewer_override.name: Story Viewer Override
story_viewer_override.description: Turns on certain features which Snapchat hid

friend_feed_menu_buttons.name: Friend Feed Menu Buttons
friend_feed_menu_buttons.description: Select which buttons to show in the Friend Feed Menu Bar

friend_feed_menu_position.name: Friend Feed Position Index
friend_feed_menu_position.description: The position of the Friend Feed Menu component

enable_friend_feed_menu_bar.name: Friend Feed Menu Bar
enable_friend_feed_menu_bar.description: Enables the new Friend Feed Menu Bar

messaging.name: Messaging
messaging.description: Change how you interact with friends

anonymous_story_viewing.name: Anonymous Story Viewing
anonymous_story_viewing.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you've seen their story

hide_bitmoji_presence.name: Hide Bitmoji Presence
hide_bitmoji_presence.description: Prevents your Bitmoji from popping up while in Chat

hide_typing_notifications.name: Hide Typing Notifications
hide_typing_notifications.description: Prevents anyone from knowing you're typing a message

unlimited_snap_view_time.name: Unlimited Snap View Time
unlimited_snap_view_time.description: Removes the Time Limit for viewing Snaps

disable_replay_in_ff.name: Disable Replay in FF
disable_replay_in_ff.description: Disables the ability to replay with a long press from the Friend Feed

prevent_message_sending.name: Prevent Message Sending
prevent_message_sending.description: Prevents sending certain types of messages

better_notifications.name: Better Notifications
better_notifications.description: Adds more information in received notifications

notification_blacklist.name: Notification Blacklist
notification_blacklist.description: Select notifications which should get blocked

auto_save_messages_in_conversations.name: Auto Save Messages
auto_save_messages_in_conversations.description: Automatically saves every message in conversations

gallery_media_send_override.name: Gallery Media Send Override
gallery_media_send_override.description: Spoofs the media source when sending from the Gallery

message_preview_length.name: Message Preview Length
message_preview_length.description: Specify the amount of messages to get previewed

snapchat_plus.name: Snapchat Plus
snapchat_plus.description:
Enables Snapchat Plus features
Some Server-sided features may not work

disable_metrics.name: Disable Metrics
disable_metrics.description: Blocks sending specific analytic data to Snapchat

disable_video_length_restrictions.name: Disable Video Length Restrictions
disable_video_length_restrictions.description: Disables Snapchat's maximum video length restriction

disable_google_play_dialogs.name: Disable Google Play Services Dialogs
disable_google_play_dialogs.description: Prevent Google Play Services availability dialogs from being shown

force_media_source_quality.name: Force Media Source Quality
force_media_source_quality.description: Forces Snapchat's Media Quality to the specified value

disable_snap_splitting.name: Disable Snap Splitting
disable_snap_splitting.description:
Prevents Snaps from being split into multiple parts
Pictures you send will turn into videos

rules.name: Rules
rules.description: Manage Automatic Features for individual people

camera.name: Camera
camera.description: Adjust the right settings for the perfect snap

disable_camera.name: Disable Camera
disable_camera.description: Prevents Snapchat from using the cameras available on your device

immersive_camera_preview.name: Immersive Preview
immersive_camera_preview.description:
Prevents Snapchat from Cropping the Camera preview
This might cause the camera to flicker on some devices

streaks_reminder.name: Streaks Reminder
streaks_reminder.description: Periodically notifies you about your Streaks

remaining_hours.name: Remaining Time
remaining_hours.description: The remaining amount of time before the notification is shown

group_notifications.name: Group Notifications
group_notifications.description: Group notifications into a single one

native_hooks.name: Native Hooks
native_hooks.description: Unsafe Features that hook into Snapchat's native code

fix_gallery_media_override.name: Fix Gallery Media Override
fix_gallery_media_override.description: Fixes various issues with the Gallery Media Send Override feature (e.g. Save Snaps in chat)

android_id.name: Android ID
android_id.description: Spoofs your Android ID to the specified value

mock_location.name: Mock location
mock_location.description: Spoofs the Mock Location device state

app_passcode.name: App Passcode
app_passcode.description: Sets a passcode to lock the app

app_lock_on_resume.name: App Lock On Resume
app_lock_on_resume.description: Locks the app when it's reopened

infinite_story_boost.name: Infinite Story Boost
infinite_story_boost.description: Bypass the Story Boost Limit delay

meo_passcode_bypass.name: My Eyes Only Passcode Bypass
meo_passcode_bypass.description:
Bypass the My Eyes Only passcode
This will only work if the passcode has been entered correctly before

unlimited_multi_snap.name: Unlimited Multi Snap
unlimited_multi_snap.description: Allows you to take an Unlimited Amount of Multi Snaps

no_friend_score_delay.name: No Friend Score Delay
no_friend_score_delay.description: Removes the delay when viewing a Friends Score

add_friend_source_spoof.name: Add Friend Source Spoof
add_friend_source_spoof.description: Spoofs the source of a Friend Request

hidden_snapchat_plus_features.name: Hidden Snapchat Plus Features
hidden_snapchat_plus_features.description:
Enables unreleased/beta Snapchat Plus features
Might not work on older Snapchat versions

path_format.create_source_folder: Create folder for each media source type
path_format.append_hash: Add a unique hash to the file name
path_format.append_source: Add the media source to the file name
path_format.append_username: Add the username to the file name
path_format.append_date_time: Add the date and time to the file name

gallery_media_send_override.multiple_media_toast: You can only send one media at a time

chat_export.select_amount_of_messages: Select the amount of messages to export (leave empty for all)
chat_export.finished: Done! You now can close this dialog.

streaks_reminder.notification_text: You will lose your Streak with {friend} in {hoursLeft} hours
